name: PF404 for PetFinder
author: Steve Meyer

sections.description:
PF404 for PetFinder will replace your generic 404 page and replace it with animals available for adoption. You can select between dogs, cats, birds, reptiles, horses, small and fury, and even barnyard animals. Configure the page heading and contents of your 404 pages within the plugin settings page.
This plugin does require a free PetFinder API key.
This plugin or plugin developer is not affiliated with PetFinder.com.
sections.installation: Install like any other plugin, directly from your plugins page. Once activated go to Settings > PF404 for PetFinder to configure. This plugin does require a free PetFinder API key, instructions are in the plugin settings page.
sections.faq:
Q. How does it get animals available for adoption?
A. The plugin calls the PetFinder API once a day and collects a list of 18 random animals across the US (of the type you specified in the plugin settings), and stores these in the database.
Q. Is there a way to only show animals from a certain area?
A. Not at this time but this is an enhancement I hope to add in the future.

Installation Instructions

Install like any other plugin, directly from your plugins page. Once activated go to Settings > PF404 for PetFinder to configure. This plugin does require a free PetFinder API key, instructions are in the plugin settings page.

short_description: Overrides your 404 page template and shows dogs, cats, and other animals in need of new homes and available for adoption.
